oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Norm Hamlet, Don Markham and Merle Haggard - 2012-04-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion with Norm Hamlet, Don Markham and Merle Haggard from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 11, 2012. Companion to a Bakersfield Music exhibition.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Panel discussion moderated by Michael Gray. Includes audio from video and selected audio excerpts. Bakersfield Sound pioneers Norm Hamlet, Don Markham, and Merle Haggard discuss their involvement in Bakersfield’s music and their work. Pedal steel guitarist Hamlet joined Merle Haggard's band the Strangers in 1967, and saxophonist and trumpeter Markham joined by the early 1970s.
